title: net/smtp: timeout support similar to net.DialTimeout
body:
Similar to the addition of `DialTimeout` to `net` package:
https://github.com/golang/go/issues/240
https://github.com/golang/go/blob/964309e2fdd7f1e1b7b7e0c601446dc85d5d41bf/src/pkg/net/dial.go#L78

Would be nice to add some symmetry with `DialTimeout` for `smtp` package:
https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/src/net/smtp/smtp.go#L43-L45
